General.Name: Evergreen Sustainable Enterprises Inc.
General.Description: Evergreen Sustainable Enterprises, Inc. operates green energy asset company with operations in the Bitcoin mining and hemp industries. Its Bitcoin operations are located in Costa Rica; and hemp operations are located in western Kentucky and Denver, Colorado. In the hemp industry, the company uses its proprietary technology to dry, clean, process, and store hemp. In addition, it owns and leases real estate to companies needing seed storage facilities located within the greater Denver area. The company was formerly known as Generation Hemp, Inc and changed its name to Evergreen Sustainable Enterprises, Inc. in March 2023. Evergreen Sustainable Enterprises, Inc. is based in Dallas, Texas.
